item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 07 Mar 2023
item.description:
1. Watch.ocaml.org: out of beta, and a call for new videos
  2. Companies using OCamlâ€“staffing/recruitment/training?
  3. Dune 3.7.0's native support for watch mode on Windows (blog post)
  4. Introduction to Eio (video)
  5. MirageOS retreat in Marrakech May 1st - 7th
  6. Liquidsoap 2.1.4 and rolling release 2.2.x are out!
  7. Users of opam-repo: what sort of change tracking would you like?
  8. VS Code Expect and Inline Tests extension
  9. ~ppx_minidebug~ automates the printf in printf-style debugging
  10. VS Code testing extension for Alcotest and inline Alcotest PPX 0.1.0 - initial release
